item.description:
See comments-photos-last year...

Bring in the New Year on beautiful Cape Cod!

It's more than a party at the Cape...

Last year was a blast!
Don't miss out on the fun this year!

Includes...

  • 2 fun days at the Cape
  • a fabulous New Years Eve Party with lots of great food
  • one night accommodations at an ocean front resort
  • champagne toast
  • live music by the Foxwoods House Band, lots of dancing, party favors
  • all taxes and service charges and...
  • breakfast buffet the next day!

ENJOY TWO FUN DAYS OF SOCIALIZING AND ENJOYING THE CAPE WITH FUN PEOPLE! Your organizer will be planning fun stuff to do during the day, such as walking around Woods Hole and Falmouth, taking a scenic drive along the Falmouth Road Race route, and visiting the beaches.

 PARTY DETAILS

 Live Band - Primal Funk

Food Stylings of Executive Chef Daniel Kenney

8:00 pm - 9:30 pm Dinner

9:30 pm - 12:30 am Live Music and Dancing

$195 double occupancy*

$225 single occupancy

*Change the amount in the payment box for double occupancy
Let us know who you plan on rooming with.You may use the comments section below to find a roommate.

Pay online or send check to: Jacki Rose, PO Box 98, Southboro, MA 01772
You will be added to the event list when your check is received.

***

Enjoy the Cape with the meetup group!

Fun Agenda subject to change

  • Afternon Delight On the Water
    12:30 pm meet at the Casino Wharf for lunch on the water and get to know your fellow meetup members.
  • Scenic Drive: After lunch we will take a scenic drive along the Falmouth Road Race route
  • Woods Hole: We will end up in Woods Hole for a stroll through the small quaint town
  • Downtown Falmouth: We will then drive to downtown Falmouth to browse the shops and and enjoy a nice hot cup of coffee, tea, or hot tottie!
  • Check-In/Relax: Followed by checking in at the hotel with time to relax before our big party celebration!
  • NEW YEARS EVE CELEBRATION!!!
    7:30 pm Meet in the lounge for a cocktail with the group.
    8:00 pm - on PARTY!!!
  • BREAKFAST BUFFET
    Tuesday morning we will enjoy a wonderful breakfast buffet with beautiful ocean views right at the resort.
  • Cape Cod Canal
    Let's start the New Year off with some energy and fresh air (weather permitting) with a fun walk along the Cape Cod Canal.

 

New Years Eve Celebration Dinner Menu

Ocean View Dining Room Buffet open 8pm – 12:00midnight

Artisanal Cheese Platters with Peppercorn and Sea Salt Crackers, French Baguettes, Crispy Bread Sticks and water crackers served to every table when they are seated

Cold Station:

"Roll" station made to order, Chef attended Asian Rolls, including Vietnamese summer rolls, and Seared Yellow fin tuna station, including Japanese hand rolls, sashimi and tartar

Italian Antipasto Station: Shaved Prosciutto di Parma with Grilled Country Bread and Balsamic Marinated Tomato Bruschetta, made to order with sliced prosciutto to order, and griddled country bread by a chef.

Assorted antipasto platters with fresh mozzarella, etc around the chef.

Chef made to order ceaser salad

Hot Station:

Chef Made To Order, Sautéed Spicy Coconut Shrimp with Cilantro Rice

Braised Short ribs of Beef, Parmesan Whipped Potatoes, Shropshire Blue Cheese, Winter Asparagus, Truffle plated to order by chef

Pork Belly Station

Crispy Pork Belly with Bacon Braised Cabbage Dressing, plated and served to order

Scallop Station

Caramelized Sea Scallops with Parsnip Whipped Potatoes and Bacon Wrapped Asparagus, Cider Buere Blanc,

Whole Roasted Free Range Chicken Station, Thyme Jus and Roasted Root Vegetables

Brown Sugar and Black Pepper Crusted Steamship of Beef, Carved to order with Red Wine Jus, Blue Cheese Aioli, Horseradish Crème and Dijon Honey Glaze , Petite Brioche Rolls

Sweets Station:

Made To Order Chocolate Waffles with Chocolate and Vanilla Whipped Cream, Fresh Berries, Champagne Crème Anglaise, caramel sauce, chocolate sauce, raspberry coulis

Gourmet cupcakes

Assorted Tortes and cakes



Cancellation Policy
Full refund minus $20 cancellation fee if you cancel 14 or more days in advance of event.
After that, if we can re-sell your spot, you will get a full refund minus $20 cancellation fee.
item.name: New Years Overnight Party
